text.title: Analysing facebook.com/souriguha
text.more:
Trying my hands on social network analysis.

Find the visualiser code at: http://souriguha.github.com/sna_fb_souri/

The visualiser code shall prove pretty much useless for you, unless you are trying to learn some js/html/css and this is just a standard template :) I'll be keeping a tab of the pull requests though.

I haven't posted the data mining code yet since it needs some severe upgrades. I'll blog about this soon.
text.intro:
Attempt to analyze my Facebook friends graph.
<h>Code: http://souriguha.github.com/sna_fb_souri/
